deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
alertTitle: Get Notification for you outdated shopping items
alertMessage: Please grant us permission to send you a push notification on your device every time one of your shopping list items is out of date.
alertTipp: Please press the 'Activate notifications' button in the navigation menu (top left of the screen).
alertNotifications: This browser does not support notifications.
notificationBody: Thank you for subscribing to our Notification service!
